title: Bits
description: Smallest part of Scss code. MUST only contain variables, mixins, functions, and placeholders. Variable names MUST be in snake case (eg. `snake_case`). Mixin, function, and placeholder names MUST be in came case (eg. `cameCase`).

sections.title: Colours
description: Default colours MUST be defined for default libraries to compile correctly. New colours MUST always be assigned to a variable.

sections.title: Typography
description: Element text properties MUST be set as variables. Other text properties SHOULD be set as variables. Base font-size MUST be set to `62.6%` (resets font-size to `10px`). A `$global_family` MUST be set to be the primarary typeface.

sections.title: Grid
description: Default primary grid set up by `$global_columns` and `$global_gutter`. See `Layouts` for information on rows and spans.

sections.title: Utilities
description: MUST only contain mixins, placeholders, and functions. Generic examples below.

sections.title: Sprites
description: Sprite stylesheet MUST NOT be manually changed. It is generated by gulp using `npm run gulp sprite`. See `gulp` section for instructions.
